subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city is the capital of Rajasthan and was founded by Rawal Jai Singh?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजपूता का पत्रकारी रावल जाय सिंह ने बनाया था।
explanation_en:
Jaipur, also known as the Pink City, was founded by Rawal Jai Singh II and is the capital of Rajasthan.
रावल जाय सिंह ने बनाया था।
explanation_hi:
राजस्थान के पल्लीचंद्र मेंने बनाया था।
रावल जाय सिंह, यह पुराणी अरसियाँ के एकरांने बनाया था।
रावल जाय सिंह, यह पुराणी अरसियाँ के एकरांने बनाया था।
explanation_en: Rawal Jai Singh II, a Chauhan Rajput, founded Jaipur.
explanation_hi: रावल जाय सिंह, यह पुराणी अरसियाँ के एकरांने बनाया था।
question_en: Who founded Jaipur and which dynasty did it belong to?
question_hi: जापान कौन ने उसे निविकाने बनाया था।
A_en: Rawal Jai Singh II belongs to the Chauhan dynasty.
A_hi: रावल जाय सिंह एन चौहान नेविकाने बनाया था।
B_en: The city belongs to the Chauhan dynasty.
C_en: It was founded by Rawal Jai Singh II and belongs to the Rathore dynasty.
C_hi: रावल जाय सिंह एन रातोर नेविकाने बनाया था।
D_en: The city was founded by Rawal Jai Singh II of the Rathore dynasty.
D_hi: रावल जाय सिंह एन रातोर नेविकाने बनाया था।
question_en: Who founded Jaipur and which dynasty did it belong to?
question_hi: जापान को किस्ताना करने वाला था और इसका देवाना करने के लिएका वाला था।

options.option_en_explanation: Rawal Jai Singh II was a Rajput king who founded Jaipur and belonged to the Rathore dynasty.
options.option_hi_explanation: रावल जापान एक राजपुत स्वामी थांका वाला था।
options.option_hi_explanation_en: Rawal Jai Singh II was a Rajput king who established Jaipur and belonged to the Rathore dynasty.

options.option_en_explanation: Rao Raja Jai Singh II was a ruler who founded Jaipur and was a member of the Rathore dynasty.
Rao Raja Jai Singh II was a Rajput king who established Jaipur and belonged to the Rathore dynasty.
Rao Raja Jai Singh II was a Rajput ruler who founded Jaipur and was a part of the Rathore clan.
Rao Rao Jai Singh II was a Rajput prince who established Jaipur as a capital and was a member of the Rathore family.
Rao Raja Jai Singh II was a Rajput king who founded Jaipur and was a member of the Rathore clan.
